mapper.select: select p.*, c.community_name from zy_park p LEFT JOIN zy_community c ON p.community_id = c.community_id WHERE p.park_id = #{parkId}
mapper.insert: insert into zy_park(park_id, park_code, community_id, park_type, park_status, park_is_public, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark) values (#{parkId}, #{parkCode}, #{communityId}, #{parkType}, #{parkStatus}, #{parkIsPublic}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{remark})

insert into zy_park(park_id,park_code, community_id, park_type, park_status, park_is_public, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark) values
(#{entity.parkId},#{entity.parkCode}, #{entity.communityId}, #{entity.parkType}, #{entity.parkStatus}, #{entity.parkIsPublic}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.remark})

insert into zy_park(park_code, community_id, park_type, park_status, park_is_public, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark) values
(#{entity.parkCode}, #{entity.communityId}, #{entity.parkType}, #{entity.parkStatus}, #{entity.parkIsPublic}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.remark})
on duplicate key update park_code = values(park_code), community_id = values(community_id), park_type = values(park_type), park_status = values(park_status), park_is_public = values(park_is_public), create_by = values(create_by), create_time = values(create_time), update_by = values(update_by), update_time = values(update_time), remark = values(remark)
mapper.update:
update zy_park
park_code = #{parkCode},
community_id = #{communityId},
park_type = #{parkType},
park_status = #{parkStatus},
park_is_public = #{parkIsPublic},
create_by = #{createBy},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_by = #{updateBy},
update_time = #{updateTime},
remark = #{remark},
where park_id = #{parkId}
